mapper.select: select s.anum snum , s.aid sid , s.apwd spwd , s.ainday sinday , s.achgday schgday, s.agubun sgubun, m.anum mnum, m.dname mname, m.dbirth mbrith , m.dgender mgender, m.dtel mtel from signup s , member_detail m where s.aid = #{aid} and s.anum = m.anum

select s.anum snum , s.aid sid , s.apwd spwd , s.ainday sinday , s.achgday schgday, s.agubun sgubun, m.anum mnum, m.dname mname, m.dbirth mbrith , m.dgender mgender, m.dtel mtel from signup s , member_detail m where s.anum = #{anum} and s.anum = m.anum

select p.pnum pnum , p.psdate psdate , p.pedate pedate , p.ppay , p.pway , p.monthnum , p.pgubun , pd.pnum pdnum , pd.inment pdinment , pd.kinds pdkinds , pd.mentnum pdmentnum from payment p , payment_detail pd where p.pnum = #{anum} and p.pnum = pd.pnum
mapper.update: update (select anum snum , aid sid , apwd spwd , ainday sinday , achgday schgday, agubun sgubun from signup where aid = #{aid}) set spwd = #{apwd} , schgday = sysdate
mapper.select: select * from community_board where anum = #{anum} and wdel = 0
